summary: Website with an Admin Panel; user wants the Admin Panel entry point to be more visible.
architectural_notes: Admin Panel entry point currently accessed via bottom bottom bar; update UI to provide a more prominent, clearly labeled Admin Panel button (deep pink).

existing_features.title: Update the Admin navigation entry in the header so that when the current user is an admin, the Admin Panel entry point is rendered as a clear, high-visibility deep pink button (not a subtle/ghost link). Apply this styling for both the desktop navigation and the mobile menu entry.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the Admin Panel access button clear and highly visible, styled as a deep pink button.

projectName: Make Admin Panel button clear and deep pink for admins
